member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Culture
member.summary: Esegue l'override della proprietà CurrentUICulture del thread corrente per tutte le ricerche di risorse eseguite utilizzando questa classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata.

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource._____the_comma_is_the_chapter_verse_delimiter___Matthew_1_5__means_the_book__gospel__of_Matthew__chapter_1__verse_5___In_English_notation___Matthew_1_5___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a ",": the comma is the chapter-verse delimiter. "Matthew 1,5" means the book (gospel) of Matthew, chapter 1, verse 5. (In English notation: "Matthew 1:5".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource._____the_dash_is_a_range_delimiter__which_can_be_used_in_a_variety_of_ways_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a "-": the dash is a range delimiter, which can be used in a variety of ways:.

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource._____the_dot_is_a_delimiter_between_verses___Matthew_1_5_7__means_the_book__gospel__of_Matthew__chapter_1__verses_5_and_7___In_English_notation___Matthew_1_5_7___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a ".": the dot is a delimiter between verses. "Matthew 1,5.7" means the book (gospel) of Matthew, chapter 1, verses 5 and 7. (In English notation: "Matthew 1:5,7".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Different_combinations_of_books__chapters__and_verses_can_be_formed_using_the_comma_delimiter_and_the_dot_delimiter__in_european_notation__in_english_notation_instead_a_colon_is_used_instead_of_a_comma_and_a_comma_is_used_instead_of_a_dot__
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Different combinations of books, chapters, and verses can be formed using the comma delimiter and the dot delimiter (in european notation, in english notation instead a colon is used instead of a comma and a comma is used instead of a dot):.

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Different_combinations_of_these_delimiters_can_form_fairly_complex_queries__for_example__Mt1_1_3_5_7_9__means_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__chapter_1__verses_1_to_3__verse_5__and_verses_7_to_9___In_English_notation___Mt1_1_3_5_7_9___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Different combinations of these delimiters can form fairly complex queries, for example "Mt1,1-3.5.7-9" means the gospel according to Matthew, chapter 1, verses 1 to 3, verse 5, and verses 7 to 9. (In English notation: "Mt1:1-3,5,7-9".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.For_a_range_of_chapters___Matthew_1_2__means_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__from_chapter_1_to_chapter_2_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a For a range of chapters: "Matthew 1-2" means the gospel according to Matthew, from chapter 1 to chapter 2..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.For_a_range_of_verses_that_span_over_different_chapters___Matthew_1_5_2_13__means_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__from_chapter_1__verse_5_to_chapter_2__verse_13___In_English_notation___Matthew_1_5_2_13___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a For a range of verses that span over different chapters: "Matthew 1,5-2,13" means the gospel according to Matthew, from chapter 1, verse 5 to chapter 2, verse 13. (In English notation: "Matthew 1:5-2:13".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.For_a_range_of_verses_within_the_same_chapter___Matthew_1_1_5__means_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__chapter_1__from_verse_1_to_verse_5___In_English_notation___Matthew_1_1_5___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a For a range of verses within the same chapter: "Matthew 1,1-5" means the gospel according to Matthew, chapter 1, from verse 1 to verse 5. (In English notation: "Matthew 1:1-5".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.For_example___Matthew_1_1_2_13__means_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__chapter_1_verse_1_and_chapter_2_verse_13___In_English_notation___Matthew_1_1_2_13___
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a For example, "Matthew 1,1;2,13" means the gospel according to Matthew, chapter 1 verse 1 and chapter 2 verse 13. (In English notation: "Matthew 1:1;2:13".).

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.For_example__the_query__Matthew_1__means_the_book_of_Matthew__or_better_the_gospel_according_to_Matthew__at_chapter_1_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a For example, the query "Matthew 1" means the book of Matthew (or better the gospel according to Matthew) at chapter 1..

Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Formatting preferences can be set using the 'Preferences' window. You can choose the desired font for the Bible quotes as well as the desired line-spacing, and you can choose separate formatting (font size, font color, font style) for the book / chapter, for the verse numbers, and for the verse text. Preferences are saved automatically..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Some_Bible_versions_have_their_own_formatting__This_is_left_by_default_to_keep_the_text_as_close_as_possible_to_the_original__br__If_however_you_need_to_have_consistent_formatting_in_your_document__you_may_override_the_Bible_version_s_own_formatting_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Some Bible versions have their own formatting. This is left by default to keep the text as close as possible to the original. If however you need to have consistent formatting in your document, you may override the Bible version's own formatting..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.The_second_way_is_by_writing_your_desired_quote_directly_in_the_document__and_then_selecting_it_and_choosing_the_menu_item____0_____The_selected_text_will_be_substituted_by_the_Bible_Quote_retrieved_from_the_BibleGet_server_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a The second way is by writing your desired quote directly in the document, and then selecting it and choosing the menu item ''{0}''. The selected text will be substituted by the Bible Quote retrieved from the BibleGet server..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.The_versions_previously_selected_in_the____0____window_will_be_used__so_you_must_have_selected_your_preferred_versions_at_least_once_from_the____0____window_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a The versions previously selected in the ''{0}'' window will be used, so you must have selected your preferred versions at least once from the ''{0}'' window..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Then_God_said__Let_there_be_light__and_there_was_light_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Then God said: Let there be light, and there was light..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.There_are_multiple_dashes_in_the_query__but_there_are_not_enough_dots__There_can_only_be_one_more_dash_than_dots_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a There are multiple dashes in the query, but there are not enough dots. There can only be one more dash than dots..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.There_are_two_ways_of_inserting_a_bible_quote_into_a_document_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a There are two ways of inserting a bible quote into a document..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.There_was_a_problem_communicating_with_the_BibleGet_server__Please_try_again_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a There was a problem communicating with the BibleGet server. Please try again..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.Therefore_you_will_not_always_be_able_to_use_the_abbreviations_proposed_by_any_single_edition_of_the_Bible__you_must_use_the_abbreviations_that_are_recognized_by_the_BibleGet_engine_as_listed_in_the_following_table_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a Therefore you will not always be able to use the abbreviations proposed by any single edition of the Bible, you must use the abbreviations that are recognized by the BibleGet engine as listed in the following table:.

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_can_also_be_written_as__Mt_1__
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This can also be written as "Mt 1"..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_can_be_either_the_english_notation__as_explained_here__https___en_wikipedia_org_wiki_Bible_citation___or_the_european_notation_as_explained_here_below_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This can be either the english notation (as explained here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bible_citation), or the european notation as explained here below..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_Help_dialog_window_introduces_the_user_to_the_usage_of_the_BibleGet_I_O_plugin_for_Open_Office_Writer_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This Help dialog window introduces the user to the usage of the BibleGet I/O plugin for Microsoft Word 2007+..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_list_of_versions_is_updated_from_the_available_versions_on_the_BibleGet_server__but_since_the_information_is_stored_locally_it_may_be_necessary_to_renew_the_server_information_when_new_versions_are_added_to_the_BibleGet_server_database_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This list of versions is updated from the available versions on the BibleGet server, but since the information is stored locally it may be necessary to renew the server information when new versions are added to the BibleGet server database..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_opens_a_dialog_window_with_some_information_on_the_project_and_it_s_plugins__on_the_author_and_contributors__and_on_the_current_locally_stored_information_about_the_versions_and_languages_that_the_BibleGet_server_supports_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This opens a dialog window with some information on the project and it's plugins, on the author and contributors, and on the current locally stored information about the versions and languages that the BibleGet server supports..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.This_plugin_was_developed_by__b_John_R__D_Orazio__b___a_priest_in_the_diocese_of_Rome__chaplain_at_Roma_Tre_University_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a This plugin was developed by John R. D'Orazio, a priest in the diocese of Rome, chaplain at Roma Tre University..

member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a When you choose a version or multiple versions to quote from, this choice is automatically saved as a preference, and will be pre-selected the next time you open the ''{0}'' menu item..

member.name: P:BibleGetIO.BibleGetResource.You_cannot_use_a_dot_without_first_using_a_comma_or_a_dash__A_dot_is_a_liason_between_verses__which_are_separated_from_the_chapter_by_a_comma_
member.summary: Cerca una stringa localizzata simile a You cannot use a dot without first using a comma or a dash. A dot is a liason between verses, which are separated from the chapter by a comma..
